data.title: Went to grab a quick bite to eat
data.text:
Got a roast beef sandwich and Buffalo wings. Roast beef was great. No issues with it. Buffalo wings was loaded with sauce and I liked it like that. Not dry and good flavor. 

Inside is a bit small but when I usually go, I miss lunch time so I usually get a table.

data.title: Date Night with my husband
data.text: Seafood as good ....better than Kelly's and cost less....awesome !!! Scallops were great.  Plenty of fries and onion rings plus Cole slaw.

data.title: Great clams and delivery
data.text: I'am really surprised that know one has done a review on this place. Being from Andover I live in Texas know and visit my sister in Malden when ever I can. Down here the only clams you can get are the strips. So the first thing I do when I go through her front door is to call Mimi's for a full clam plate, and a roast beaf sandwich for later. Usually it arrives in less then 30 minutes hot and ready to eat. I have never had any complains with there food or service. I am planning to visit in July and after riding the blue and orange line and get on bus 108 and walk through her back door she probably already called.
